languages.text: {n}Глаза-бусины губернатора расширяются от страха.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Умоляю, не сочтите мои слова попыткой сколько-то влиять на ваши решения... видите ли, без Веабос-6 {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторумам{/g} на ваших мирах придется спешно искать и налаживать поставки из иных мест, а в наши неспокойные времена это чревато задержками и самыми прискорбными накладками! Все, о чем я пекусь — благополучие династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза-бусины губернатора расширяются от страха.{/n} "Ваше Благородие!.. Умоляю, не сочтите мои слова попыткой сколько-то влиять на ваши решения... видите ли, без Веабос-6 мануфакторумам на ваших мирах придется спешно искать и налаживать поставки из иных мест, а в наши неспокойные времена это чревато задержками и самыми прискорбными накладками! Все, о чем я пекусь — благополучие династии фон Валанциус!"

languages.text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза-бусины губернатора расширяются от страха.{/n} "Ваша Светлость!.. Все, о чем я пекусь — благополучие династии фон Валанциус!"

I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... you see, without Vheabos VI, the manufactorums on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! All I have in mind is the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔恐惧地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“大人！我乞求您，请别误会了我的意思，我并没打算以任何方式来影响您的决定……您看，如果失去了维博斯六号星，您所有世界的{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}将不得不匆匆忙忙地寻找新的供应商，安排新的运输手段。在这个充满动乱的时代，这么做可能会导致延误，可能还会发生别的悲惨事故！我唯一在乎的，就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣！”
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔恐惧地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“大人！我乞求您，请别误会了我的意思，我并没打算以任何方式来影响您的决定……您看，如果失去了维博斯六号星，您所有世界的{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}将不得不匆匆忙忙地寻找新的供应商，安排新的运输手段。在这个充满动乱的时代，这么做可能会导致延误，可能还会发生别的悲惨事故！我唯一在乎的，就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的繁荣！”

languages.text: {n}Drivestem, presa del miedo, abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Le ruego que no interprete mis palabras como un intento de influir en sus decisiones... Verá, sin Vheabos VI, los {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} de sus mundos tendrán que buscar proveedores en otros lugares y organizar nuevos envíos, y, dados los tiempos que corren, ¡se exponen a retrasos y otras tragedias! ¡Mi única preocupación es la prosperidad de la dinastía von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem, presa del miedo, abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Le ruego que no interprete mis palabras como un intento de influir en sus decisiones... Verá, sin Vheabos-VI, los {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} de sus mundos tendrán que buscar proveedores en otros lugares y organizar nuevos envíos, y, dados los tiempos que corren, ¡se exponen a retrasos y otras tragedias! ¡Mi única preocupación es la prosperidad de la dinastía von Valancius!».

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムの大きな目が、恐怖でさらに見開いた。{/n}「陛下！私利私欲のために意見を申し上げているわけでは決してございません…ヴィアボス・VIがなければ、惑星の{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}は他の地で新たな供給者を見つけ、新たな出荷を急ぎで手配しなければなりません。この困難な時代において急な変化を遂げれば、遅延やその他の悲劇的な災難を招く恐れがあります！私はあくまでもフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の繁栄を思って述べているまで！」
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムの大きな目が、恐怖でさらに見開いた。{/n}「陛下！私利私欲のために意見を申し上げているわけでは決してございません…ヴィアボス・VIがなければ、惑星の{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}は他の地で新たな供給者を見つけ、新たな出荷を急ぎで手配しなければなりません。この困難な時代において急な変化を遂げれば、遅延やその他の悲劇的な災難を招く恐れがあります！私はあくまでもフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の繁栄を思って述べているまで！」

languages.text: {n}Drivestems Knopfaugen weiten sich vor Schreck.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich flehe euch an, deutet meine Worte nicht als Versuch, in irgendeiner Weise Eure Entscheidungen zu beeinflussen ... Aber ohne Vheabos VI müssen die {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorien{/g} auf Euren Welten rasch woanders neue Lieferanten finden und neue Lieferungen veranlassen, und in diesen unruhigen Zeiten ist das Risiko von Verzögerungen und anderen tragischen Unglücken beträchtlich! Meine einzige Sorge gilt dem Wohlstand der Dynastie von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestems Knopfaugen weiten sich vor Schreck.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich flehe euch an, deutet meine Worte nicht als Versuch, in irgendeiner Weise Eure Entscheidungen zu beeinflussen ... Aber ohne Vheabos-VI müssen die {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorien{/g} auf Euren Welten rasch woanders neue Lieferanten finden und neue Lieferungen veranlassen, und in diesen unruhigen Zeiten ist das Risiko von Verzögerungen und anderen tragischen Unglücken beträchtlich! Meine einzige Sorge gilt dem Wohlstand der Dynastie von Valancius!"

languages.text: {n}Drivestem écarquille les yeux dans lesquels vous dénotez un zeste de peur.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous prie de me croire, je ne cherche en aucun cas à influer sur vos décisions. Voyez-vous, sans Vhéabos-VI, les {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} de vos mondes devront se hâter de trouver d'autres fournisseurs et de mettre en place un nouveau calendrier de livraisons. Or, en ces temps troublés, les risques de faire face à des retards ou à d'autres contretemps fâcheux sont très élevés ! Je m'inquiète uniquement pour la prospérité de la dynastie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem écarquille les yeux dans lesquels vous dénotez un zeste de peur.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Je vous prie de me croire, je ne cherche en aucun cas à influer sur vos décisions. Voyez-vous, sans Vhéabos-VI, les {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} de vos mondes devront se hâter de trouver d'autres fournisseurs et de mettre en place un nouveau calendrier de livraisons. Or, en ces temps troublés, les risques de faire face à des retards ou à d'autres contretemps fâcheux sont très élevés ! Je m'inquiète uniquement pour la prospérité de la dynastie von Valancius ! »

languages.text: {n}Drivestem'in boncuk gibi gözleri korkudan kocaman açılıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalvarırım sözlerimi herhangi bir şekilde kararınızı etkileme girişimi olarak almayın. Vheabos VI olmadan dünyalarınızdaki {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumlar{/g} kısa sürede başka yerlerden yeni tedarikçiler bulup yeni siparişler verecektir. Yani bu sıkıntılı zamanlarda gecikmelere ve daha trajik sorunlara yol açabilirler! Benim tek endişem, von Valancius hanedanlığının refahı içindir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's beady eyes widen in fear.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I beg of you, do not interpret my words as an attempt to influence your decisions in any way... You see, without Vheabos VI, the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorums{/g} on your worlds will need to make haste to find new suppliers elsewhere and arrange for new shipments, and in these troubling times, they run the risk of delays and other most tragic mishaps! My only concern is for the prosperity of the von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem'in boncuk gibi gözleri korkudan kocaman açılıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Yalvarırım sözlerimi herhangi bir şekilde kararınızı etkileme girişimi olarak almayın. Vheabos VI olmadan dünyalarınızdaki {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}lar kısa sürede başka bir yerde yeni bir tedarikçi bulur ve yeni siparişler verirler ve bu sıkıntılı zamanlarda gecikmelere ve daha trajik sorunlara yol açabilirler! Benim tek endişem von Valancius hanedanlığının refahı üzerinedir!"
